channel.title: docopt on Mike Yu
channel.description: Recent content in docopt on Mike Yu

item.title: trying out docopt
item.description: trying out docopt In my last post I created a very small command line interface (CLI) using argparse, which is a built in Python module. This time around I’m going to use the same code as before but instead of argparse I’ll use a third-party module calle docopt. I got this idea from a great talk called From Python script to Open Source Project by Michał Karzyński. It has a lot of great content about putting together a fully-fledged open source Python project and I recommend watching the whole thing.
